description_for_human: Connect to your Obsidian vault to search and discuss your personal knowledge. Query by text, tags, or dates to explore connections in your notes. Save your conversations to your daily notes.
description_for_model: This plugin enables hybrid RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) searches over an Obsidian vault, combining semantic search with symbolic features (tags, links, dates). You can query notes by natural language and filter by tags and date ranges. You can also save the current conversation to today's daily note. When using this plugin: 1) Always offer to narrow searches with tags or date ranges if results are too broad 2) Acknowledge when you find connections between notes 3) Cite the sources from the vault that informed your answers 4) Offer to save important conversations to the user's daily note.
